duties_responsibilities.duty: Understanding clients' needs and expectations, their business and industry, accounting and control systems, employees, company values and industry-related accounting and financial reporting topics Developing an understanding of the RSM audit approach and tools Assessing risks and evaluating the client's internal control structure Performing substantive tests and tests of internal controls to identify and resolve accounting or reporting issues Drafting financial statements under prescribed formats

education_certification.credential: 90 credit hours completed Working towards B.A. / B.S. degree or equivalent from accredited university Accounting Major
